content.prompt: Chord 4 in measure 2 is best analyzed as

choices.label: a secondary leading-tone chord to ⅱ that resolves stepwise to ⅲ.
a secondary leading-tone chord to ⅲ that resolves stepwise to ⅱ.
a secondary dominant to ⅵ that resolves stepwise to Ⅳ.
a secondary dominant to Ⅳ that resolves stepwise to ⅳ.

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in notated music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
